title: NEED HELP | Flipkart | Tekion | JPMC | SDE 2 | Offer evaluation
content:
Education: Tier 1 (non - CS)
Years of Experience: 3.5 years
Current CTC: 18 L (16.5 + 1.5 Variable)
Company: Investment Bank
Tech stack - Backend Development (Java Springboot)


Company: Tekion - (Platform Team)
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 33 LPA
Signing Bonus: 1 L
Stock bonus: 30L for 4 years
Performance Bonus: not mentioned in letter, need to check w HR
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 42 for 1st year 


Company: Flipkart
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 27 LPA
Performance Bonus: 2.7 LPA (10%)
Stock bonus: 14 LPA for 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 33 LPA


Company: JP Morgan Chase
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 28 LPA
Performance Bonus: 2.8 (ranges b/w 7-12 prcent)
Stock bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 31 L approx


**JPMC I don't want to join, as I've already worked in a bank.
I'm a little more inclined towards Flipkart as of now, how actually is Tekion in terms of work?**

**I feel Flipkart would be doing better things internally in terms of tech, but some advice would be helpful here.**

I also think I would learn more at Flipkart because of the scale that it operates at, not sure about this for Tekion.

Also how are hikes and bonuses at Flipkart and Tekion if anyone knows? I'm aware that Flipkart didn't give any hikes for past 2 years.

title: Need Urgent Help - Salesforce AMTS vs Meesho
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience:  4 month as full time at MNC (16.25 base + 1.75 JB)
Prior Experience: NIL
For fresh grad, any related Internship/coop experience :  6 month intern at FAANG + 6 month intern at MNC 
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Meesho
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 21 lpa 
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NIL
Stock bonus: 12 lpa for 4 years
Bonus: NIL
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 33 lpa (24 lpa for first year)
Benefits: Standard Meesho Benefits
Other details: Confused between this and Salesforce AMTS (The job title is AMTS but role is QAE and I have all my experiences in Software Development, standard AMTS compensation and benefits, loc : hyd (29 lpa first year/ 45 lpa ctc))
yoe: 4 Month As Full Time At Mnc

title: SAP offer evaluation| AI developer |Banglore
content:

Years of Experience: 5.6
Prior Experience: AI Engineer at product company
Current compensation: INR 23LPA (21 fixed, 2 variable)

Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
Company: SAP Labs
Title/Level: AI developer. T2 level 2
Location: Banglore
Salary: INR 2600000
Relocation: -
Signing Bonus: 
Stock bonus: - 
Bonus: 2.9
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 2900000
Benefits: SAP labs benefits 
Other details:  Requested to add current year performance bonus as signing bonus.

How good is this offer ?
